nodes.text: Amry was a male police officer who served with the Coruscant Security Force on the planet Coruscant. By 18 BBY, Amry, a combat trained officer, had achieved the police rank of sergeant and was in charge of a unit of the Special Weapons Team. In 18 BBY, Amry and his special ops team accompanied Prefect Pol Haus and Lieutenant Kalibar Droosh to a supposed criminal hideout in a maglev train. However, the train was rigged and exploded, wounding several of Army's men.
Amry was first mentioned in the The Last Jedi, a novel by Michael Reaves and Maya Kaathryn Bohnhoff that was released on February 26, 2013.
